nz.co.abrahams.asithappens
Class Flow

java.lang.Object
  nz.co.abrahams.asithappens.Flow

public class Flow
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a captured flow, which corresponds to a captured packet or set of packets sharing some similar characteristics.

Author:
mark

Constructor Summary

Constructor Detail

Flow

public Flow(long timestamp,
            Device sourceDevice,
            Device destinationDevice,
            int ethertype,
            int protocol,
            int sourcePort,
            int destinationPort,
            int length)
Creates a new flow record for an IP-based flow.

Parameters:
timestamp - the time at which the flow was captured
sourceDevice - the sending device
destinationDevice - the receiving device
ethertype - the "ethertype" field in the the packet
protocol - the IP protocol
sourcePort - the source UDP/TCP port
destinationPort - the destination UDP/TCP port
length - the length of the packet
